Keywords: Utopia , X-Men
Real Name: Scott Summers
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. When a friendly character uses the X-Men team ability, before rolling the d6 you may instead remove Cyclops's RALLY die to use it as the result. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)
LIKE WE PRACTICED, X-MEN: Enhancement, Leadership.

SpaceTitanium
I can see this guy making the x-men TA a bit more usable, part of the reason i never see anyone use it is because you're basically spending an action to trade a click with another figure, with some of the recent figures that can use it for free and this guy negating the damage for it. coupled with some solid support utility and good damage output i can for sure see this guy making a few of my x-men teams in the future
August 11, 2021
Goop
I honestly dont see the x-men team ability really used that much. When i do its rarely useful. IMO this rally is probably one of the weaker ones. However the stats of cyclops are all pretty good with 7range psyblast and esd. Enhance and leadership are also extremely useful. Good figure all around but primarily for his stats and powers at only 45pts.
